authorAttribution.displayName: Kelly Robinson New York Real Estate

originalText.text: Judd is by far the best lender I have had the pleasure of referring my clients to. In my 18+ years in residential real estate, I have never met anyone who can get a complicated loan processed so smoothly and effectively. Simply put, my clients absolutely love Judd and his team. They are always available and despite how much business they have, they make it a point to make every client feel like they are number one. If you are looking for knowledge, professionalism, and an ethical lender, look no further.
